div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

margin: 4px auto; width: 180px; height: 150px; background-image: url(http://vortex.accuweather.com/adcbin/netweather_v2/backgrounds/orange_180x150_bg.jpg); background-color: #ff6600; background-repeat: no-repeat no-repeat;
font-family: arial, helvetica, verdana, sans-serif; font-size: 10px; line-height: 12px; color: #ffffff; text-align: center;

span.h3:
Thank you for visiting the home page of ACE Academy. We are a strict discipline academy located in Highland Park, MI. We serve at-risk youth in the Metro Detroit area and provide education to those students in residential treatment with Spectrum Juvenile Justice Services as well as post-treatment continuing education in two community centers in Detroit and Highland Park.
We are very proud of our school and its mission to provide high-quality educational options for all students. The Academy serves young men and women from ages 12-20 and focuses on innovative educational programming to provide credit recovery options as well as high school completion.
If you are looking for a dynamic, rewarding career where creativity and teamwork lead to revolutionary teaching and learning, this is the place for you. Click the "Careers" link to see current job postings.
Thank you!
The ACE Academy Team

div.div: On August 26, ACE Academy celebrated a Decade of Dedication with special guests from the academy, partners, community members, and stakeholders. Hor D'ouvres, desserts, and a special presentation were on the menu at La Dolce Vita in Highland Park. Special recognition for team members that celebrated a decade or more of service to the academy, board members, Authorizer Central Michigan University Center for Charters, and SJJS partners was acknowledged in a presentation by edtec President and CEO, Anna Amato. We would like to thank everyone who attended the celebration, and, more importantly, all those who have contributed to the success of ACE Academy for the past decade. READ MORE...
